title: [K-12] Collective Experiential Learning in the Digital Age: Collaborative Online Design for Language Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Learners participate in online/offline collaborative activities using digital devices, with collective experiential learning effects measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and share contextual aspects of language expressions through at least three group collaboration activities on digital platforms
Learners can resolve over 80% of errors occurring in the language acquisition process through collective feedback via online discussions and shared activities
Learners can contribute to collective knowledge building by producing one project deliverable every two weeks in blended environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
